overview: Belladonna's new fetishistic exploration covers a multitude of sexual fixations, from hairy bushes to medical domination to pussy shaving to animal costumes, with lots and lots of footsucking and feet play for the true fanatics. A perverted all-girl cast full of Bella's adventurous friends (lovely Bobbi Starr, cutiepie Lexi Belle, sexy glasses-wearing Sinn Sage, and more) make Belladonna: Fetish Fanatic 7 a cornucopia of lesbian eroticism. . . with something to please the sex fiend in us all! Belladonna: Fetish Fanatic 7 comes as a deluxe 2-disc package containing over two hours of revealing behind-the-scenes footage and interviews, plus Belladonna trailers. Review: AAAA 1/2
title: Fetish Fanatic 7
